title: [Forbidden Hills, Grasslands]
description: At first glance, the foothills appear quiet and still, however, upon further inspection, a variety of insects and wildlife can be seen.  Overly large crickets occasionally jump to and fro amongst the grass and wildflowers, disappearing in the lush green grass every time they land.

At first glance, the foothills appear quiet and still, however, upon further inspection, a variety of insects and wildlife can be seen.  Overly large grasshoppers occasionally jump to and fro amongst the grass and wildflowers, disappearing in the lush green grass every time they land.
